Description: The Product Manager leads cross-functional teams to develop and deliver high-impact products. This role requires balancing strategic thinking with detailed execution, focusing on user needs, business goals, and technical feasibility.

The HR Manager oversees all aspects of human resources practices and processes. The role is critical in ensuring a positive employee experience, aligning HR strategies with business goals, and promoting a strong organizational culture.

The Mobile Developer is responsible for creating, testing, and deploying mobile applications for iOS and/or Android platforms. They collaborate with product teams to build seamless, performant, and user-friendly experiences.
